testcase.name: Verify_Cart_Updates_After_Adding_Items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify cart updates after adding items given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 7.813s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.09275s e when User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.201s then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.006981s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify_Cart_Updates_After_Removing_Items
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify cart updates after removing items given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 8.82s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.09176s e when User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.399s when User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.202s when User removes item 'bike light' from the cart ... passed in 1.21s then The cart badge should show the correct number of items ... passed in 0.005817s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Verify_Items_And_Navigation_To_Checkout_Page_From_Cart
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin
scenario: Verify items and navigation to checkout page from cart given User login as 'standard' user ... passed in 8.719s then User navigates to the inventory page ... passed in 0.1915s e when User adds item 'bike light' to the cart ... passed in 1.3s when User adds item 'bolt t-shirt' to the cart ... passed in 1.199s when User clicks on the cart icon ... passed in 1.22s then User verify the items in cart ... passed in 0.00698s when User proceeds to checkout page ... passed in 1.187s then User should be navigated to the checkout page ... passed in 0.007483s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
